name: Season Up
description: You play with a ball, the goal of which is to reach the top platform. Jump over the protruding buttons you take off higher and you need to direct the ball to not fall down. Total in the game are 12 platforms, each corresponds to the months of the year, and is highlighted in color.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32-64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: DualCore Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512mb Storage: 40 MB available space
